description: React component page for editing a note, including fetching the note, editing, saving, and deleting functionalities within a Next.js app.

methods.name: EditNotePage
methods.description: React component for the note editing page, managing state and side effects for fetching, editing, and deleting a note.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles the save action for updating the note with new data.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles the delete action for removing the note.
